properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

A beautifully presented four bedroom detached family home located in a highly sought after residential road. The property boasts spacious and well-proportioned accommodation throughout including a large reception room, modern fitted kitchen/diner, four double bedrooms and a family bathroom. Further benefits include a private rear garden, off street parking and a garage.

A stylish one bedroom apartment situated on the second floor of this modern development. The property offers bright and spacious accommodation throughout including an open plan kitchen/living room, double bedroom and modern bathroom. Further benefits include secure entry, lift access and allocated parking.

A charming three bedroom semi-detached house located in a quiet residential cul-de-sac. The property offers spacious and well-proportioned accommodation throughout including a large reception room, modern fitted kitchen, three bedrooms and a family bathroom. Further benefits include a private rear garden and off street parking.

A spacious two bedroom apartment located on the top floor of this modern development. The property offers bright and spacious accommodation throughout including an open plan kitchen/living room, two double bedrooms and a modern bathroom. Further benefits include secure entry, lift access and a balcony.

A stunning five bedroom detached house located in a highly sought after residential road. The property boasts spacious and well-proportioned accommodation throughout including a large reception room, modern fitted kitchen/diner, five bedrooms and three bathrooms. Further benefits include a private rear garden, off street parking and a double garage.

A stylish one bedroom apartment situated on the ground floor of this modern development. The property offers bright and spacious accommodation throughout including an open plan kitchen/living room, double bedroom and modern bathroom. Further benefits include secure entry and communal gardens.

A beautifully presented four bedroom detached family home located in a quiet cul-de-sac. The property boasts spacious and well-proportioned accommodation throughout including a large reception room, modern fitted kitchen/diner, four bedrooms and two bathrooms. Further benefits include a private rear garden, off street parking and a garage.
